fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Select a player, learn everyone who visits them.
- (Rehearsal) Select a player. You will block any attacks to them and attack a random attacker. You will then rehearse.
- (Concert) At the beginning of the night, all players will only be able to target players within 2 positions from them. Band members are exempt. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Both you and the target learn visitors.
- (Concert) This is a day ability.
- **Rehearse Radius:** 3
